game_description: Warp into the twisted world of UPENDERS! and gun your way through this new multiplayer shooter that can only be experienced in VR. #### GAMEPLAY * Duck! Dodge! And gun your way through bullet hell shootouts with four different weapon types. * Use your wits and warp between floors, walls and ceilings to navigate mind bending twisted maps. * Peer through the your warp scope to surveil surroundings and volley lasers or grenades through the portal at unsuspecting targets! * Compete in teams with online players and bots in the Domination game mode, where the first team to fill their reactor gauge wins the match, or rack up eliminations in Team Deathmatch * Make use of the multiverse of equipment at your disposal, including the Blast Shield, Stealth Knife and grenades! #### Join our Discord! Strong opinions? Weâ€™d love to hear them! https://discord.gg/vDqqJBSejd
review_1: I love this game but I never see nobody playing the game It so fun sometimes want with my friend but it to late the bots are fine it suck this could be good game to play but not any more I hope the Developers fix game. ðŸ‘‹ðŸ¥²
review_2: This game has so much potential. Keep working on it and it will become more popular
review_3: I've had an amazing time with this game with it's wacky geometry and Portal antics. Everytime I play (either with friends or public lobbies) I always have a blast! And some of the people I've seen on this game are extremely creative with their own styles I've never seen before. Gonna miss this game and the wacky lobbys/Players it brought with it, best of luck on your next project <3
review_4: See, the concept of this game is great. But the bots get kinda annoying. Their should be an option to turn off bots and a smaller map with that. So me and my friend could play like a 1v1 type thing. Thanks for the great game I hope their are more updates coming soon.
review_5: So, I found this game when it first came out and it looked very cool, and I tried it out, did the tutorial, and it was fun. Only one tiny problem was, THERE WAS NO PLAYERBASE!! Thank god that people found this underrated game. Another small problem is that I always get lost in maps.. yâ€™all should add more variety to platform textures, and turn down the fog a littleâ€¦ other than that, Itâ€™s a great game, totally underrated! 9/10 UPDATE: I just found out that this game is dead again and it hurts to see nobody plays this anymore. I also just found out the servers are going down May 2022! Rest In Peace Upenders, you were an amazing game while you lasted.ðŸ˜”
